content: *like the poncho that martha wore going home and on her poncho show lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 50189-13c *chs-scallopedgeponcholarge pdf* corrections applied sep 30 2005 size l-1x 2x-3x circumference at neck edge 23½ 25½ inches 59 75 64 75 cm length at center point 33 36 inches 84 91 5 cm homespun® article #790 5 balls crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm gauge 7 double_crochet + 4 row = 4 inches \ 10 cm in block pattern st 7½ single_crochet + 8 row = 4 inches \ 10 cm stitches block shell worked in rounds starting at the neck edge chart for crochet edging is provided frequently asked questions information is provided please note that this pattern is also in medium adult size here 1 as well as child 3 and pet 4 sizes 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/coming-home-poncho-70370ad 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/martha-stewart-coming-home-poncho-kids-sizes-crochet 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/martha-stewart-coming-home-pooch-poncho-crochet
